price: Onlar, Firdevs’e varis olacaklardır ve onlar orada ebedî kalacaklardır.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يَرِثُونَ ٱلۡفِرۡدَوۡسَ هُمۡ فِيهَا خَٰلِدُونَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna yarithūna al-fir'dawsa hum fīhā khālidūna
